thread.section_title: Truecar Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Truecar | truecar.com
thread.title: Melissa C

author: Melissa C
title: Melissa C
text: Using Truecar took the headache out of my car buying experience. At first I was dealing with my bank's recommendation which wasn't local and a couple other dealers I've done business in the past. None of them could deliver what they promised nor could they do it quick enough so I decided to try Truecar. A couple of the same dealers came up on their list but when I tried the one dealer I had never considered I was told they could deliver what I was requesting. I showed up the next day and drove home in my new van with no issues. They delivered and came under everyone else's asking price including the MSRP my bank recommended.
